text: Matthew Spender (born 1945) is an English sculptor. He is the author of From a High Place: A Life of Arshile Gorky (1999), a biography of his father-in-law, the artist Arshile Gorky,Andrew Solomon, "His Life Was a Forgery", The New York Times, 11 July 1999. and A House in St John's Wood (2015), about his father, the poet Stephen Spender."A House in St John's Wood", bookdepository.com. Spender was born in London, England, the son of the poet Stephen Spender and the pianist Natasha Spender."Matthew Spender." Contemporary Authors Online. Gale, 2017.
